顡字的基本解释

顡
wài
〔痴顡〕不聪明。

顡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wài］
［《廣韻》五罪切，上賄，疑。］
［《廣韻》魚既切，去未，疑。］
痴呆。

顡字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顡； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1409第08
【廣韻】【集韻】?魚旣切，音毅。【玉篇】癡顡，不聰明也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?五怪切，音聵。義同。　又【五音集韻】他怪切。顏惡也。　又【集韻】迍怪切，音膪。擊頭聲。一曰聉顡，無志。　又【廣韻】五罪切【集韻】五賄切，?音頠。義同。

考證：〔【玉篇】痴顡，不聰明也。〕　謹照原文痴顡改癡顡。
顡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
顡字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Shan
wài
[Silly] Not smart.
Shan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wài］
["Guangyun" five crimes are cut, bribery, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" the fish is cut, but not gone, suspicious. ]
dementia.
Shan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顡; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1409 Page 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fish cut, Yin Yi. 【Jade articles】I'm crazy, but I'm not smart.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Five strange cuts, sound wavy. The same meaning.　[Five Yinjiyun] He is weird. Yan is evil too.　[Jiyun] again strangely cut, the sound is faint. Head hitting sound. One said that he had no ambitions.　[Guang Yun] Five Sins Cut [Ji Yun] Five Bribery Cuts,? Sound. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Jade articles] I am foolish, not smart. 〕　I would like to change the idiot according to the original text.
Shan
